name: B.F. Sword
bonus: 15 Attack damage.

name: Chain Vest
bonus: 25 Armor.

name: Giant's Belt
bonus: 200 Health.

name: Needlessly Large Rod
bonus: 15 Spell power.

name: Negatron Cloak
bonus: 25 Magic resist.

name: Recurve Bow
bonus: 20% Attack speed.

name: Sparring Gloves
bonus: 10% Crit and +10% Dodge chance.

name: Spatula
bonus: It must do something...

name: Tear of the Goddess
bonus: 15 Mana.

name: Bloodthirster
bonus: Basic Attacks heal the holder for 40% of the damage dealt.

name: Blue Buff
bonus: [Unique] After casting a spell, set your mana to 20.

name: Bramble Vest
bonus: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150★ magic damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Chalice of Power
bonus: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 35 Spell Power for the rest of combat.

name: Deathblade
bonus: Contributing to a kill grants the holder +20 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 1).

name: Dragon's Claw
bonus: Reduces incoming magic damage by 60%.

name: Duelist's Zeal
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Duelist trait.

name: Elderwood Heirloom
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Elderwood trait.

name: Force of Nature
bonus: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Frozen Heart
bonus: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 50%. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
bonus: The holder gains 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

name: Giant Slayer
bonus: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 90%.

name: Guardian Angel
bonus: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
bonus: Basic Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Hand of Justice
bonus: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic attacks and spells deal +45% Damage or Basic attacks and spells heal for 45% of damage dealt.

name: Hextech Gunblade
bonus: The holder's spells heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 400 damage.

name: Infinity Edge
bonus: [Unique] Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% become +1% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Ionic Spark
bonus: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
bonus: The holder's spells can inflict critical hits. Gain 40% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Last Whisper
bonus: [Unique] When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 80% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
bonus: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300/375/500/800★ damage for 8 seconds.

name: Luden's Echo
bonus: When the holder casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 180 magic damage, and 180 bonus damage if they are crowd-controlled.

name: Mage's Cap
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Mage trait.

name: Morellonomicon
bonus: [Unique] When the holder deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Quicksilver
bonus: [Unique] The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 10 seconds of combat.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
bonus: The holder gains 50 additional Spell Power.

name: Rapid Firecannon
bonus: The holder gains 200% Attack Range, and their Basic Attacks can't miss.

name: Redemption
bonus: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
bonus: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 90% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

name: Shroud of Stillness
bonus: [Unique] When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 33% until they cast.

name: Spear of Shojin
bonus: The holder's basic attacks restore 5 Mana on-hit.

name: Spirit of the Dragon
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Dragonsoul trait.

name: Statikk Shiv
bonus: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 80 magic damage to 3/4/5/6★ enemies, and 240 true damage if they are shielded.

name: Sunfire Cape
bonus: [Unique] At start of combat, and every 2 seconds thereafter, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

name: Sword of the Divine
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Divine trait.

name: Thief's Gloves
bonus: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. Consumes three item slots.

name: Titan's Resolve
bonus: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 1% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

name: Trap Claw
bonus: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for 4 seconds.

name: Vanguard's Cuirass
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Vanguard trait.

name: Warlord's Banner
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Warlord trait.

name: Warmog's Armor
bonus: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
bonus: [Unique] The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: Zeke's Herald
bonus: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain 35% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Zephyr
bonus: [Unique] When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
bonus: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts all nearby enemies for 1 second. When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000★ Health arises to continue the fight.
